TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ManagementQuery extends System.Object implements class System.ICloneable

Docs.summary: Provides an abstract base class for all management query objects.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Clone() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a copy of the object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller. This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void ParseQuery(string query) cil managed

Docs.param: The query string to be parsed.
Docs.summary: Parses the query string and sets the property values accordingly. If the query is valid, the class name property and condition property of the query will be parsed.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller. This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
## Examples The following example parses a query into class name and condition properties.
[!code-cs[wminet_ManagementQuery_ParseQuery#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.management.mana_19_1.cs)] [!code-vb[wminet_ManagementQuery_ParseQuery#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.management.mana_19_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string QueryLanguage { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the query language used in the query string, defining the format of the query string.
Docs.value: Returns a <xref:System.String> value containing the format of the query string.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
## Property Value Can be set to any supported query language. "WQL" is the only value supported intrinsically by WMI.
## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller. This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string QueryString { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the query in text format.
Docs.value: Returns a <xref:System.String> value containing the query.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
## Property Value If the query object is constructed with no parameters, the property is null until specifically set. If the object was constructed with a specified query, the property returns the specified query string.
## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller. This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
